message: I understand you want a fair split, but the value of the money decreases for me each round. This offer accounts for that.
Considering your loss, I'll meet you halfway
This offer is still beneficial for both of us, and accounts for the time pressure we are both under.
Time pressure affects you more, I'll take a bit less than before
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the most straightforward and fair deal possible. We both lose if this fails.
